src:
Jadwal TV: 5 - 8 November 2019
05 Nov 2019, 00:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Panasnya akhir pekan kemarin masih belum hilang dari ingatan, namun jangan keburu santai karena seperti biasa jadwal tengah pekan ini tak kalah serunya.
Gemerlap pentas Liga Champions dan Liga Europa bakal kembali dihadirkan pada tengah pekan ini. Selain itu, ada pula kiprah Timnas Indonesia U-19 di ajang Kualifikasi Piala Asia U-19 2020.
Tak hanya itu, jangan lewatkan pula laga menarik dari ajang lainnya. Langsung saja, inilah jadwal tayangan televisi nasional untuk tanggal 5 hingga 8 November 2019 selengkapnya.

CATATAN:


beIN Sports 1 dan 2 tersedia di MNC Vision, IndiHome, MNC Play, TransVision, Vidio Premier, dan K-Vision
Champions TV 1 dan 2 tersedia di Vidio Premier, Nex Parabola, IndiHome, dan Firstmedia
Usee Sports 1 dan 2 tersedia di IndiHome
First Football tersedia di Firstmedia
FOX Sport, FOX Sport 2 dan FOX Sport 3 tersedia di MNC Vision, IndiHome, Firstmedia, dan K-Vision
Soccer Channel, MNC Sports 1, MNC Sports 2 tersedia di MNC Vision

PERHATIAN: Jadwal televisi ini bisa berubah sewaktu-waktu tanpa pemberitahuan terlebih dahulu dari stasiun televisi bersangkutan dan bukan merupakan tanggung jawab Bola.net.
text:
TV Schedule: November 5 - 8 2019
05 November 2019, 00:44 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The heat of last weekend has not yet disappeared from memory, but do not hurry relax because as usual this midweek schedule is no less exciting.
Sparkling Champions League and Europa League performances will be presented again in the middle of this week. In addition, there is also the work of the Indonesian U-19 national team in the U-19 Asian Cup Qualification event 2020.
Not only that, do not miss the interesting game from other events. Immediately, this is the schedule of national television shows for November 5 to 8 2019 in full.

NOTE:


beIN Sports 1 and 2 are available at MNC Vision, IndiHome, MNC Play, TransVision, Vidio Premier, and K-Vision
Champions TV 1 and 2 are available at Vidio Premier, Nex Parabola, IndiHome, and Firstmedia
Usee Sports 1 and 2 are available at IndiHome
First Football is available at Firstmedia
FOX Sport, FOX Sport 2 and FOX Sport 3 are available on MNC Vision, IndiHome, Firstmedia, and K-Vision
Soccer Channel, MNC Sports 1, MNC Sports 2 are available at MNC Vision

ATTENTION: This television schedule may change at any time without prior notice from the relevant television station and is not the responsibility of Bola.net.
